title: What is a Neoplasm?
content: - A neoplasm is an abnormal mass of tissue that grows independently of normal tissues.
It can be benign (non-cancerous) or malignant (cancerous).
image_desc: A microscopic image showing a cluster of abnormal cells.
narration: Neoplasm kya hota hai?  Ye ek aisa tissue ka group hai jo normal tissue se alag badhta hai. Ye do tarah ka hota hai: benign aur malignant. Benign neoplasm cancer nahi hota, lekin malignant neoplasm cancer hota hai.

title: Types of Neoplasms
content:
**Malignant:**
    - Rapidly growing
    - Invasive
    - Can spread to other parts of the body (metastasis)
image_desc: A diagram showing the difference between a benign and malignant tumor.
narration: Benign neoplasm dhire dhire badhta hai aur normal tissue mein nahi jaata. Ye zindagi ke liye khatarnaak nahi hota. Lekin malignant neoplasm bahut tez badhta hai aur normal tissue mein jaata hai. Ye body ke dusre hisson mein bhi ja sakta hai, jisko metastasis kehte hain.

title: Causes of Neoplasms
content: - **Genetic mutations:** Changes in DNA can lead to uncontrolled cell growth.
**Environmental factors:** Exposure to carcinogens (cancer-causing substances) like tobacco smoke, radiation, and certain chemicals.
**Lifestyle factors:** Diet, exercise, and alcohol consumption can influence the risk of developing neoplasms.
image_desc: A graphic showing a DNA strand with a mutation highlighted.
narration: Neoplasm ka kaaran kya hai? DNA mein badlaav hone se cell ka alag badhna shuru ho sakta hai. Iske alawa, pollution, radiation, aur kuch chemicals bhi neoplasm ka kaaran ban sakte hain. Khaane-peene ki aadat aur exercise bhi ispe asar daal sakta hai.

title: Symptoms of Neoplasms
content: - **Lumps or bumps:**  A noticeable change in the size or shape of a body part.
**Changes in bowel or bladder habits:**  Frequent or difficult urination or bowel movements.
image_desc: A person examining a lump on their arm.
narration: Neoplasm ke lakshan kya hai?  Body mein koi lump ya bump dikh sakta hai.  Dard bhi ho sakta hai, aur aap bahut thakane lage.  Bina kisi wajah se aap ka weight bhi kam ho sakta hai.  Aapko bowel ya bladder mein bhi dikkat ho sakti hai.

title: Diagnosis and Treatment
content: - Diagnosis:  Physical examination, imaging tests (X-ray, CT scan, MRI), biopsy.
Treatment:  Surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, immunotherapy.
image_desc: A doctor examining a patient's medical records.
narration: Neoplasm ka diagnosis kaise hota hai?  Doctor aapko check karenge, aur aapko X-ray, CT scan, ya MRI karne ko bolenge.  Biopsy bhi kiya ja sakta hai.  Neoplasm ka ilaaj surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, aur immunotherapy se kiya ja sakta hai.

title: Prevention and Early Detection
content: - **Healthy lifestyle:**  Maintain a healthy weight, eat a balanced diet, exercise regularly, and limit alcohol consumption.
**Regular screenings:**  Get regular checkups and screenings as recommended by your doctor.
narration: Neoplasm se bachne ke liye kya karein?  Aapko healthy lifestyle follow karna chahiye.  Aapko regular checkups aur screenings karane chahiye.  Isse aap neoplasm ko jaldi pakad sakte hain, aur iska ilaaj bhi aasaan hota hai.
